works.description:
This website is providing free full length downloads of at least 3 of my music tracks. 

The first one is noted here (Exodus) and the others will be added below. I sell mp3s of my music via my own website (www.thebluemask.com) and this website is infringing my copyright by providing free downloads of my music.

This website is providing free full length downloads of at least 3 of my music tracks. 

The second one is noted here (Scorpio) and the others will be added below. I sell mp3s of my music via my own website (www.thebluemask.com) and this website is infringing my copyright by providing free downloads of my music.

This website is providing free full length downloads of at least 3 of my music tracks. 

The third one is noted here (Outpost 31). I sell mp3s of my music via my own website (www.thebluemask.com) and this website is infringing my copyright by providing free downloads of my music.
